Title: Blowback
Plot: When a murderous inmate takes hostages, Raylan must scramble to defuse the situation before the bullets start flying.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: W. Earl Brown, Jere Burns, M.C. Gainey, Rick Gomez, Fredric Lehne, William Ragsdale, Walton Goggins
